text: Third Watch is an American television crime drama. It was created by John Wells and Edward Allen Bernero. It originally aired from September 23, 1999 to May 6, 2005 on CBS. ==Other websites== * Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs Category:1999 American television series debuts Category:2005 American television series endings Category:1990s American drama television series Category:2000s American drama television series
title: Third Watch
